product_name: HP 15s Core i5 10th Gen - (8 GB/1 TB HDD/Windows 10 Home) 15s-DU1034TU Thin and Light Laptop
brand_name: HP 15s Core i5 10th Gen - (8 GB/1 TB HDD/Windows 10 Home) 15s-DU1034TU Thin and Light Laptop

reviews: Excellent fully loaded laptop with with Windows and latest MS Office version.
Very good configuration and performance. Supports voice commands for some functions.
Only drowback is key board letters are very thin. So, can be difficult to work in dark.

This is one excellent laptop. It's very light and fully loaded with 64  bit windows, MS office 2019 and McAfee anti virus. The 1 TB hard disk needs partitioning though but I could do it very easily . Boots very fast. Owing to i5 processor and 8 GB ram, it's very smooth. Sound quality and picture quality are best in the segment. Finger print reader is very useful. Though it does not have DVD drive but I guess it's no more required now a days. The voice command based typing in MS Office is simp...
Good one but poor camera. Otherwise it is the best one.
I purchased for my brother. It is good performing till now .

Slow system even with a 10th Gen i5 booting up is so slow. This product gave me an issue in the very third day of purchase even though am not installing too much software, only three software was installed and sudden product was hung up for half an hour even if trying to restart nothing is happening. Worst product. I would recommend not buying this product.
It takes much more time to boot

storeAdditionalDetails.Keyboard: Full-size Island-style Natural Silver Keyboard with Numeric Keypad
